Text:
LOL, damn I didnt think they'd start the bailout process in issue 1... 

I knew pretty much NOBODY liked the whole #700 nonsense, but to literally push the "we can bail this out" button on issue #1?!

Like I said in the #700 comments.. I give this 6 months... maybe a year.. before they push that reset button.
This is legit, but the scan quality is low. I'm gonna look for a better scan. Thanks anyway, Ahlat.
We'll get a better quality scan tomorrow, but in the meantime, THANK YOU for early upload!

Let me get this straight, you really think Marvel intends to keep Dr Octopuses mind in Spider-man long term?

Of course Peter Parker is coming back! You must be all of 12 to think this is permanent.
